channel.title: A no-args constructor is stopping this server from running
channel.description:
So i start the run.bat on the server and it worked awhile ago, so does anybody know what to change?

item.title: A no-args constructor is stopping this server from running
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Here’s what it’s looking for

public Something() {

}

Here’s what you have

public Something(some thing) {

}

Read full topic
item.source: A no-args constructor is stopping this server from running
